full_description:
KSTAR 650VA Offline UPS

The KSTAR 650VA Offline UPS is built in 230V Input Voltage, 230 (+/-10%) Output voltage with 50 Hz frequency. This offline UPS has a Typical 4-8ms, 13ms max Transfer Rate, and 24V Battery with 7.5 weight. It is intelligent battery discharging/ Charging management, Overload Protection, an Uninterruptible Power Supply, and compatible with Generators. This KSTAR 650VA Offline UPS provides 01 year of warranty.

title: KSTAR 1500VA Offline UPS
cat_seo_title: KSTAR UPS Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech

full_description:
KSTAR 1500VA Offline UPS

The KSTAR 1500VA Offline UPS provides backup power and protection for your electrical equipment in the case of a power loss or fluctuation. It is an offline UPS, which means it goes into battery mode when the main power goes out or falls below a particular threshold. It can provide a continuous power supply for a short time until the main power is restored or an alternate power source is available. It has a volt-ampere (VA) rating of 1500V, indicating the maximum power that the UPS can provide. It also has a load capability of 900 watts, which implies it can power devices using up to 900 watts. KSTAR 1500VA Offline UPS has an input voltage range of 140–300V and an output voltage range of 230V, making it compatible with the majority of electrical equipment. It also includes a frequency range of 50HZ - 60HZ, allowing it to adjust to various power sources and areas. It has an average transfer rate of 4–8 ms, which implies it can transition from main power to battery mode in 4-8 milliseconds. This helps avoid data loss or harm to your devices caused by a power outage or surge. It has a backup period of 7–20 minutes depending on the load, which means it can preserve your work or securely shut down your devices before the battery dies. It features a 1-meter cable that is long enough to connect the UPS to the devices and the power outlet. It also features a lightweight and durable plastic body. Its dimensions are 380 x 158 x 198mm, making it small and easy to store. The KSTAR 1500VA Offline UPS with Plastic Body is a reliable and effective backup power and protection solution for your electrical equipment.

KSTAR 2000VA Offline UPS

The KSTAR 2000VA Offline UPS provides backup power and protection for your electrical equipment in the case of an electrical power failure or fluctuation. It is an offline UPS, which means it enters battery mode when the main power goes out or falls below a certain threshold. It can give continuous power for a brief period of time until the main power is restored or an alternate power source is available. It has a volt-ampere (VA) rating of 2000V, which indicates the maximum power that the UPS can produce. It also has a load capacity of 1200 watts, implying that it can power equipment using up to 1200 watts. KSTAR 2000VA Offline UPS has an input voltage range of 140–300V and an output voltage range of 230V, making it compatible with the majority of electrical equipment. It also includes a frequency range of 50HZ - 60HZ, allowing it to adjust to various power sources and areas. It has an average transfer rate of 4–8 ms, which implies it can transition from main power to battery mode in 4–8 milliseconds. This helps avoid data loss or harm to your devices caused by a power outage or surge. It has a backup period of 7–20 minutes depending on the load, which means it can preserve your work or securely shut down your devices before the battery dies. It features a 1-meter cable that is long enough to connect the UPS to the devices and the power outlet. It also features a lightweight and durable plastic body. Its dimensions are 380 x 158 x 198mm, making it small and easy to store. The KSTAR 2000VA Offline UPS with Plastic Body is a reliable and effective backup power and protection solution for your electrical equipment.

full_description:
KSTAR 3000VA Line Interactive Offline UPS

The KSTAR 3000VA Line Interactive Offline UPS is a reliable and effective home or office power backup solution. It has a 3000VA capacity and a load capacity of 2400 watts, and it can power different devices such as PCs, routers, printers, and more. It has a pure sine wave output, which ensures that your delicate equipment receives reliable and clean power. The KSTAR 3000VA Line Interactive Offline UPS offers an input voltage range of 115–300 VAC, allowing it to adapt to various power circumstances and safeguard your equipment from voltage swings. It also features an output voltage of 220, 230, or 240 volts at 2% (inverter output) and an output frequency of 50 Hz at 1% (battery mode), allowing it to meet your region's standard power criteria. The KSTAR 3000VA Line Interactive Offline UPS features a 4x 12V 9AMP built-in battery that can supply backup power for 15–30 minutes, depending on the load. The rechargeable battery has a lengthy service life. A smart LCD display on the UPS indicates the status of the input voltage, output voltage, load level, battery level, and other information. An audible warning on the UPS alerts you to low battery, overload, or fault conditions. The KSTAR 3000VA Line Interactive Offline UPS is simple to set up and use. Its tiny and durable design allows it to fit in any place. It also features many outlets that can be used to connect to various devices.
